tutorial.text: Your selected courses are shown here. Click a course to view its details, or click the to remove it. Click the to show or hide a course from the schedule below. Click the to copy the CRN for a course.
Click this button to show a plain list of the CRNs for all courses currently shown.

Use these tabs to select one of your schedules, or click the to add a new schedule. Double click a tab to rename that schedule. Click the to remove a schedule. Note that you cannot remove a schedule if it is your only schedule.
Your current schedule is shown here. Click on an event to show the details for that course. Events can be dragged to other sections of the course.
Use this button to try to automatically fix conflicts in your schedule.

Use this filter bar to manage your course filters. Filters can be added by typing in the filter name (case insensitive) followed by the ':' character. Filters can then be deleted with the Backspace key or by clicking the on the filter.
Filters can also be added using these buttons.
All courses passing the filters can be viewed here. Click on a course to view its details. Click the to add or remove a course from your selected courses.
